attributes.action: Review the School's 6 Weeks Summer Holiday evaluating the Coronavirus situation.
attributes.additional_details:
I propose that if all is okay in July to return back to work for the Teacher’s and children to resume until mid-August with a 2 week break prior to normal September return. 
Our children our future, but in the current circumstances, so is Education. 
Kindly support this petition, as shocking and radical this may sound, it’s actually the right way forward. (flights grounded, planned holidays / major events cancelled - where are you going to go?)
attributes.background:
The School Summer Holidays of 6 weeks should reviewed. 
As and when we are out of the Virus issue, it will be absolutely absurd to take another 6 weeks off school.
